text: Rami "Rambo" Hakanpää (born 9 October 1978 in Pori) is a Finnish footballer who plays for HJK in the Veikkausliiga. ==Career== Hakanpää started his footballing career at his local club FC Jazz and was signed by HJK in 2000. At HJK he became the fans favorite player, and he made his breakthrough during the 2003 season when HJK won both Finnish Cup and Veikkausliiga. After that Hakanpää had troubles with multiple injuries and spent almost two season in the sidelines. On 2007 he was signed by FC Honka. On October 2010 Hakanpää was signed back by HJK. ==References== *Guardian Football ==External links== * Category:Finnish footballers Category:Finland international footballers Category:FC Jazz players Category:Helsingin Jalkapalloklubi players Category:FC Honka players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:FC Kontu players Category:Association football defenders
title: Rami Hakanpää
